modName: KiDarga and Friends - Multiple Standalone Follower Mod
summary:
My OC's are your followers, all marriagable, all standalone.
Marta, Su'Jara, Scott, Kurdan, Ki'Darga.
descriptionHtml:
// Why I Made This Mod:
This is a labor of love, from my newest to my oldest OC's.
Been sharing the pictures with everyone, and it's time to take the next step and share my own Characters with all of you.


// What This Mod Does:
Every Character I have EVER created is now available to you!  Pick and choose who you want in your game, and they will travel with you, do whatever you want with them.. (crime doesn't bother them one bit!)
SU'JARA, SCOTT and KURDAN are now all available!  And of course Ki'Darga :P
Everyone SHOULD be marriagable (If I missed something, please don't hesitate to let me know so I can make any needed changes.)  I will continue to release everyone else as they are completed.


// Currently Available Followers And Their Locations:
(NEW!) Su'Jara - Is staying at the Winking Skeever in Solitude.
(NEW!) Scott - Can be found in the Ragged Flagon, entrance area from the Ratway.
(NEW!) Kurdan gro-Dragol - Located at the Dragonsreach, Great Porch.
Ki'Darga - Located in Falkreath in front of the Dead Man's Drink.


[img]http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7405/10579655214_8ace188505_z.jpg[/img]


// Coming Soon:
Marta


// Future Plans:
At some point when my modding skills have improved, I would like to add 1 quest per follower.


// Known Issues:
Unfortunately Su'Jara's ApachiiSkyHair is not available at the moment, I will include eventually!
Currently Scott's facial tattoos will be MIA, until I can properly port them. (SORRYS!)


// Requirements:
Skyrim v.1.9.32
<< These are standalone so no other mods are required.


// HIGHLY Recommended Mods:
MFVM - More Follower Voices Mod Plus Khajiit Marriage by Mysticentity (This adds cute courting dialogue for any Khajiit you want to marry!)
Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster(This is pretty much must-have, I won't play Skyrim without it)
Multiple Marriages-Spouse Dress Up-Rehousing-And More by Dudestia

(If you want them to look more closely the way they appear in my screenshots.)
Kinematic ENB Extensive by Kyokushinoyama _ --JawZ-- _ Solsikke737
The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot
Beards by Hvergelmir 
Brows by Hvergelmir
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Detailed Lips by Xenius
Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase
Coverkhajiits by mrLenski
Muscular Khajiit Normalmap by Khajiitas




// Mods Used To Create Most Of These Followers:
Enhanced Character Edit by ECE team


// Credits, Thanks And Kudos:
ECE team for their amazing:  Enhanced Character Edit mod
Shadowtigers and Lordess Kudos and Thanks to you BOTH, for holding my hand thru the CK!
And of course a big Thank You to Bethesda for letting us do pretty much whatever we want in your worlds!

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * 
PLEASE -- DO ME A FAVOR - If you like and continue to use any of my followers, share your pictures!  That's the only payment I would like to receive from all of you!  I'll be watching, and can't wait to see what (sexy) adventures you take them on!  Oh, and remember to endorse too :)

* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
author: Binmaru
